properties.retaliationSlowDefensiveAbility: 30 ~ 80% Reduced Defensive Ability Retaliation for 3.0 Second(s)

OneShot_Scroll.name: Scroll of Arcane Power
OneShot_Scroll.description: Opens a conduit of pure energy that flows from the celestial planes into the caster, granting them improved control over their mystical powers.

OneShot_Scroll.name: Scroll of the Cyclops
OneShot_Scroll.description: Calls upon a mighty Cyclops to do the caster's bidding.  Due to the iron will of the Cyclops, however, mastery of this fearsome being can only be held for a short time.

OneShot_Scroll.name: Scroll of the Sky's Rage
OneShot_Scroll.description: Calls on the power of the skies to rain fury upon nearby enemies.

OneShot_Scroll.name: Scroll of Vulnerability
OneShot_Scroll.description: Creates a field of energy that weakens the defenses of enemies caught inside.

OneShot_Scroll.name: Scroll of the Warrior's Song
OneShot_Scroll.description: Inspires the caster, greatly improving their offensive capabilities in melee combat.

OneShot_Scroll.name: Scroll of the Breaking Wheel
OneShot_Scroll.description: Sends a devastating flurry of blades in all directions.

OneShot_Scroll.name: Scroll of the Crushing Vortex
OneShot_Scroll.description: Creates a maelstrom of destructive power around the caster.

OneShot_Scroll.name: Scroll of Elemental Shielding
OneShot_Scroll.description: Encases the caster in a mystic shield that absorbs damage from all elemental attacks.

OneShot_Scroll.name: Scroll of Frailty
OneShot_Scroll.description: Blasts surrounding enemies with a wave of energy that saps their physical strength, greatly reducing their ability to deal damage with most weapons.

OneShot_Scroll.name: Scroll of Frenzy
OneShot_Scroll.description: Fills the caster with incredible fury, increasing their speed and the damage of their attacks.

OneShot_Scroll.name: Scroll of the Ice Nova
OneShot_Scroll.description: Sends a blast of bitter cold air out from the caster's location.

OneShot_Scroll.name: Scroll of the Storm Witches

properties.offensiveProjectileFumble: 33% Chance of Impaired Aim for 3.0 Second(s)

OneShot_Scroll.description: Summons a pair of powerful Harpy witches.  Using fierce lightning attacks, these fearsome beasts devastate enemies from a distance.

OneShot_Scroll.name: Scroll of the Stalwart Alliance
OneShot_Scroll.description: Grants an aura which improves both the armor and attack strength of the caster and their allies.

OneShot_Scroll.name: Scroll of Unbroken Fortitude
OneShot_Scroll.description: Strengthens the will of the caster, greatly improving their ability to withstand damage in battle.

OneShot_Scroll.name: Greater Scroll of the Djinn
OneShot_Scroll.description: Summons a mighty Djinn spellcaster.  Though powerful in war, the Djinn is also valuable for the mystical enhancements it provides for the caster and their allies.

OneShot_Scroll.name: Greater Scroll of the Earthquake
OneShot_Scroll.description: Sends shockwaves of force through the surrounding ground, damaging and stunning any nearby enemies.

OneShot_Scroll.name: Greater Scroll of the Necromancer
OneShot_Scroll.description: Raises a force of flame-enchanted skeletal warriors to do the caster's bidding.

OneShot_Scroll.name: Greater Scroll of Vampirism
OneShot_Scroll.description: Lays down a field of vampiric energy.  The life force of any enemies who cross into this field will be ripped from their souls and transferred to the caster.

OneShot_Scroll.name: Greater Scroll of Vengeance
OneShot_Scroll.description: Lashes out in fiery retaliation each time the caster is struck by a melee attack.

OneShot_Scroll.name: Greater Scroll of the Breaking Wheel
OneShot_Scroll.description: Sends a devastating flurry of blades in all directions.

OneShot_Scroll.name: Greater Scroll of the Crushing Vortex
OneShot_Scroll.description: Creates a maelstrom of destructive power around the caster.

OneShot_Scroll.name: Greater Scroll of Elemental Shielding
OneShot_Scroll.description: Encases the caster in a mystic shield that absorbs damage from all elemental attacks.

OneShot_Scroll.name: Greater Scroll of Frailty
OneShot_Scroll.description: Blasts surrounding enemies with a wave of energy that saps their physical strength, greatly reducing their ability to deal damage with most weapons.

OneShot_Scroll.name: Greater Scroll of Frenzy
OneShot_Scroll.description: Fills the caster with incredible fury, increasing their speed and the damage of their attacks.

OneShot_Scroll.name: Greater Scroll of the Ice Nova
OneShot_Scroll.description: Sends a blast of bitter cold air out from the caster's location.

OneShot_Scroll.name: Greater Scroll of the Storm Witches

properties.offensiveProjectileFumble: 33% Chance of Impaired Aim for 3.0 Second(s)

OneShot_Scroll.description: Summons a pair of powerful Harpy witches.  Using fierce lightning attacks, these fearsome beasts devastate enemies from a distance.

OneShot_Scroll.name: Greater Scroll of the Stalwart Alliance
OneShot_Scroll.description: Grants an aura which improves both the armor and attack strength of the caster and their allies.

OneShot_Scroll.name: Greater Scroll of Unbroken Fortitude
OneShot_Scroll.description: Strengthens the will of the caster, greatly improving their ability to withstand damage in battle.

OneShot_Scroll.name: Divine Scroll of the Archmage's Fury
OneShot_Scroll.description: Grants the caster improved control over their inner powers, allowing them to use their skills more quickly and more effectively.

OneShot_Scroll.name: Divine Scroll of Armageddon
OneShot_Scroll.description: Rips the very fabric of the universe asunder, devastating all who enter its area of influence.

OneShot_Scroll.name: Divine Scroll of the Arrow Dancer
OneShot_Scroll.description: Grants the caster improved reflexes, allowing them to dodge most incoming projectiles.

OneShot_Scroll.name: Divine Scroll of the Behemoth
OneShot_Scroll.description: Summons an enormous demonic beast from the netherworld.

OneShot_Scroll.name: Divine Scroll of the Maddened God
OneShot_Scroll.description: Summons the avatar of a mad god.  Although control can only be maintained for a short while, the god can wreak havoc in even this short time span.

OneShot_Scroll.name: Divine Scroll of Magebane

properties.offensiveManaBurn: 30% Energy Drained (200% Energy Drained Causes Damage)

OneShot_Scroll.description: Turns the inner power of surrounding enemies against them, burning their bodies with the power of their own magic.

OneShot_Scroll.name: Divine Scroll of the Breaking Wheel
OneShot_Scroll.description: Sends a devastating flurry of blades in all directions.

ItemRelic.name: Essence of Archimedes' Mirror
ItemRelic.description: Archimedes was one of the greatest of Greece's philosophers and scientists.  Can enchant shields only.

ItemRelic.name: Essence of Artemis' Bowstring
ItemRelic.description: Artemis, the Greek goddess of the hunt, is renowned for her skill with the bow.  Can enchant bows only.

ItemRelic.name: Essence of Dionysus' Wineskin
ItemRelic.description: The drink of Dionysus, Greek god of wine and revelry, is a potent brew indeed.  Can enchant rings and amulets.

ItemRelic.name: Essence of the Golden Fleece
ItemRelic.description: The Golden Fleece, sought after by Jason and his Argonauts, is rumored to hold great power as well as great beauty.  Can enchant torso armor only.

ItemRelic.name: Essence of Hecate's Crescent
ItemRelic.description: Hecate is a mysterious Greek goddess associated with the moon, childbirth, and magic.  Can enchant rings and amulets.

ItemRelic.name: Essence of Herakles' Might
ItemRelic.description: Herakles was the strongest of all the Greek heroes.  Can enchant all armor.

ItemRelic.name: Essence of Hermes' Sandal
ItemRelic.description: Hermes the Messenger is the swiftest of the Greek gods.  He is known for his iconic winged sandals.  Can enchant leg armor only.

ItemRelic.name: Essence of Prometheus' Flame
ItemRelic.description: Prometheus, son of the titan Iapetus, gave the gift of fire to mankind.  Can enchant all weapons.

ItemRelic.name: Essence of the Valor of Achilles
ItemRelic.description: Achilles was the greatest of all the Greek warriors of the Trojan War.  His strength and speed in battle were legendary.  Can enchant all weapons.

ItemRelic.name: Essence of Zeus' Thunderbolt
ItemRelic.description: Zeus is the mightiest of the gods of Olympus.  The thunderbolt is his weapon and symbol.  Can enchant all weapons.

ItemRelic.name: Essence of Amun-Ra's Glory
ItemRelic.description: Amun-Ra, ruler of the sun, is the greatest of the Egyptian gods.  Can enchant all armor.

ItemRelic.name: Essence of the Ankh of Isis
ItemRelic.description: Isis is queen of the Egyptian gods.  Her symbol, the ankh, is associated with healing and immortality.  Can enchant rings and amulets.

ItemRelic.name: Essence of Anubis' Wrath
ItemRelic.description: Anubis, a jackal-headed god, is ruler of the Egyptian underworld.  Can enchant all weapons.

properties.offensiveLifeLeech: 2% of Attack damage converted to Health
4% of Attack damage converted to Health
6% of Attack damage converted to Health

ItemRelic.name: Essence of the Djed of Osiris
ItemRelic.description: The Djed is the backbone of Osiris, lord of the dead.  Can enchant all weapons.

ItemRelic.name: Essence of Set's Betrayal
ItemRelic.description: Set is the Egyptian god of evil.  In an attempt to take control of the throne of the gods, Set turned on his brother Osiris, brutally hacking the latter's body apart and scattering the pieces across the land.  Can enchant all armor.

ItemRelic.name: Essence of the Udjat of Horus
ItemRelic.description: The Udjat is the eye of Horus, hawk-headed god of the sky.  It symbolizes protection and power.  Can enchant all armor.

ItemRelic.name: Essence of the Code of Hammurabi
ItemRelic.description: Hammurabi, king of Babylon, was revered for bringing justice to his people with his code of laws.  Can enchant rings and amulets.

ItemRelic.name: Essence of the Domain of the Dragon-Kings
ItemRelic.description: The Dragon-Kings are the masters of water in China.  Ocean, rain, lake, and river - all are theirs to command.  Can enchant all armor.

ItemRelic.name: Essence of Guan-Yu's Grace
ItemRelic.description: True to the tenets of Taoism, even Guan-Yu, the Taoist god of war, only fights when all other options have been exhausted.  Can enchant torso armor only.

ItemRelic.name: Essence of the Jade Emperor's Serenity
ItemRelic.description: The Jade Emperor is the ruler of the Chinese gods.  He is a contemplative deity who rarely interferes with the affairs of god or man.  Can enchant all armor.

ItemRelic.name: Essence of Li-Nezha's Guile
ItemRelic.description: Li-Nezha, a Chinese trickster god, is as nimble as he is crafty.  Can enchant all armor.

ItemRelic.name: Essence of the Monkey King's Trickery
ItemRelic.description: The Monkey King, the most mischievous of all the Chinese gods, is also one of the most powerful.  His cunning has lured many an unwary foe to do his bidding.  Can enchant rings and amulets.

ItemRelic.name: Essence of Shen-Nong's Dark Medicine
ItemRelic.description: Shen-Nong is the Chinese god of plants and medicine. He is a master of herbs - and not all are meant to cure.  Can enchant all weapons.

ItemRelic.name: Essence of Yen-Lo-Wang's Bloodletting
ItemRelic.description: Yen-Lo-Wang is a god of Death and the ruler of Feng-Du, the Chinese Hell.  Can enchant all weapons.

ItemRelic.name: Embodiment of Archimedes' Mirror
ItemRelic.description: Archimedes was one of the greatest of Greece's philosophers and scientists.  Can enchant shields only.

ItemRelic.description: Artemis, the Greek goddess of the hunt, is renowned for her skill with the bow.  Can enchant bows only.

ItemRelic.name: Incarnation of Li-Nezha's Guile

ItemRelic.name: Incarnation of the Monkey King's Trickery

ItemRelic.name: Incarnation of Shen-Nong's Dark Medicine

ItemRelic.name: Incarnation of Yen-Lo-Wang's Bloodletting
ItemRelic.description: Yen-Lo-Wang is a god of Death and the ruler of Feng-Du, the Chinese Hell.  Can enchant all weapons.

ItemRelic.name: Essence of the Blade of Thanatos
ItemRelic.description: Thanatos, the incarnation of death, carries a sword with the power to rend the very souls of mere mortals.  Can enchant all weapons.

ItemRelic.name: Essence of the Chill of Tartarus
ItemRelic.description: In the deepest pits of the underworld lies Tartarus.  Cold as the grave and swathed in darkness, it is here that punishment is meted out for those mortals foolish enough to oppose the will of the gods.  Can enchant all weapons.

ItemRelic.name: Essence of the Cunning of Odysseus
ItemRelic.description: Although not as strong or swift as the other heroes of legend, Odysseus' formidable guile made him a match for any foe.  Can enchant head armor only.

ItemRelic.name: Essence of the Iron Will of Ajax
ItemRelic.description: Numbered among the greatest of the heroes of the Trojan war, Ajax was known not only for the strength of his arm, but even more for his indomitable spirit.  Can enchant all armor.

ItemRelic.name: Essence of Persephone's Tears
ItemRelic.description: Persephone, favored daughter of the earth goddess Demeter, was forced into marriage with Hades.  She now shares rule of the underworld, yet it brings her only sorrow.  Can enchant all jewelry.

ItemRelic.name: Essence of the Rage of Ares
ItemRelic.description: Ares, the Greek god of war, is venerated and feared in equal measure.  He is cruel, vengeful, and nearly mad - only a fool would risk his wrath.  Can enchant armbands and bracelets.

ItemRelic.name: Essence of the Shade of Hector
ItemRelic.description: Hector, prince of Troy, was renowned for his noble spirit and steadfast nature.  He fell defending his homeland, mourned even by his enemies.  Can enchant all shields.

ItemRelic.name: Embodiment of the Blade of Thanatos
ItemRelic.description: Thanatos, the incarnation of death, carries a sword with the power to rend the very souls of mere mortals.  Can enchant all weapons.

ItemRelic.name: Incarnation of the Iron Will of Ajax
ItemRelic.description: Numbered among the greatest of the heroes of the Trojan war, Ajax was known not only for the strength of his arm, but even more for his indomitable spirit.  Can enchant all armor.

ItemRelic.name: Incarnation of Persephone's Tears
ItemRelic.description: Persephone, favored daughter of the earth goddess Demeter, was forced into marriage with Hades.  She now shares rule of the underworld, yet it brings her only sorrow.  Can enchant all jewelry.

ItemRelic.name: Incarnation of the Rage of Ares
ItemRelic.description: Ares, the Greek god of war, is venerated and feared in equal measure.  He is cruel, vengeful, and nearly mad - only a fool would risk his wrath.  Can enchant armbands and bracelets.

ItemRelic.name: Incarnation of the Shade of Hector
ItemRelic.description: Hector, prince of Troy, was renowned for his noble spirit and steadfast nature.  He fell defending his homeland, mourned even by his enemies.  Can enchant all shields.

ItemCharm.name: Bat Fang
ItemCharm.description: Hollow fang of a Cave Bat.  Can enhance all weapons.

ItemCharm.name: Boar Hide
ItemCharm.description: Toughened hide of a wild boar.  Can enhance all armor.

ItemCharm.name: Pristine Plumage
ItemCharm.description: High quality feathers.  Can enhance all armor.

ItemCharm.name: Turtle Shell
ItemCharm.description: A large turtle shell.  Can enhance shields only.

ItemCharm.name: Hag's Skin
ItemCharm.description: A scrap of skin from a Desert Hag.  Can enhance all armor.

ItemCharm.name: Lupine Claw
ItemCharm.description: A long, sharp claw.  Can enhance all weapons.

ItemCharm.name: Vile Ichor
ItemCharm.description: A disgusting glob of pus, blood, and bile.  Can enhance rings and amulets.

ItemCharm.name: Peng Claw
ItemCharm.description: Claw of a Peng.  Can enhance all weapons.

ItemCharm.name: Raptor Tooth
ItemCharm.description: Sharp, jagged tooth torn from a Raptor's mouth.  Can enhance amulets only.

ItemCharm.name: Saber Claw
ItemCharm.description: The razor-sharp claw of a Saber Lion.  Can enhance all weapons.

ItemCharm.name: Viny Growth
ItemCharm.description: A lump of dense plant matter.  Can enhance all armor.

ItemCharm.name: Yeti Fur

ItemCharm.description: Feathers from a carrion bird.  Can enhance all armor.
